description: "Friendly" route code that joins with PAAC geospatial data.
Route code for joining with ridership data.
Full route name as it would appear on the headsign of the bus/light rail vehicle.
The garage that the bus route operates out of. Route 64 alternates between East Liberty and West Mifflin garage; its total ridership is averaged in this dataset.
Transit mode: bus, light rail (the T), or incline.
The first day of the month in YYYY-MM-DD format.
The year-month key in YYYYMM format.

Weekday, Saturday, or Sunday/Holiday service. PAAC routes and schedules vary based on the service day. PAAC provides Sunday service on the following holidays: New Years Day, Memorial Day, Fourth of July, Labor Day, Thanksgiving, and Christmas.
The average daily riders for that month, day type, and route.
The number of days for each day_type in the month. Certain holidays are considered Sundays. Riders can be multiplied by day_count to estimate the monthly total riders.
